attributes.action: Refuse to pay the EU a penny on our departure-now and forever
attributes.additional_details: We fought for freedom and democracy- not to be ruled by unelected officials accountable to nobody. We borrowed billions to liberate you, we lost hundreds of thousands of our men in the process. You only have the right to free speech to have a go at us because of the sacrifice paid by our men. Debt paid in full. Goodbye- I hope we can be friends.
attributes.background: This is our amended Brexit deal.Goodbye, we owe you nothing. We are not paying you a penny. Up until the bombing of Pearl Harbour we were one of the very few nations that stood against the Nazis. Along with other countries we liberated you from tyranny.
